replication_study.hypothesis: H1: Controlling for year-fixed effects, the entrepreneurship rate in a country-year is negatively associated with the country’s median age.

data_plan.source_type: Aggregated survey database (country-year cells derived from the Global Entrepreneurship Monitor – GEM)

qualification.explanation: The file aggregates GEM micro-data in the same way as the original study (country-year entrepreneurship rate, population weights), so it measures the same constructs while providing fresh temporal coverage (2011-2016) to test robustness.
qualification.similarity_to_original: Variables "entrepreneurship" and "median_age" are identical to those used by the original authors (post_registration.json → method → outcome_variable & independent_variables). Weight variable "cy_cell" matches the original population weighting (see REPEntireDataset2_Country_Year_Entre_Regression.do).
qualification.deviation_from_original: The replication file includes six additional years (2011-2016) not present in the original 2001-2010 sample (post_registration.json → data → wave_or_subset). This yields 789 rows versus ≈820 rows in the original specification, providing an independent temporal extension.

data_plan.notes: Three rows miss median_age and are dropped in analysis. Country identifiers appear as phone_code and name; clustered s.e. by country is still feasible.

planned_method.steps:
1) Load replication_data_mkk9.csv
2) Drop rows with missing median_age
3) Convert median_age, entrepreneurship, cy_cell to numeric
4) Estimate weighted OLS of entrepreneurship on median_age with year fixed-effects, analytic weights = cy_cell and cluster s.e. by country
5) Export coefficient table to CSV
planned_method.models: Weighted OLS with year dummies and country-clustered standard errors
planned_method.outcome_variable: entrepreneurship (share of individuals owning a wage-paying business ≤42 months old)

planned_estimation_and_test.estimation: Coefficient of median_age in weighted OLS
planned_estimation_and_test.test: t-test on the coefficient with country-clustered standard errors

planned_method.missing_data_handling: Listwise deletion on variables used in the regression
planned_method.inference_criteria: Reject H0 if coefficient < 0 and p < 0.05 (two-tailed)

files.replication_analysis.py: Loads the dataset, cleans missing values, fits the weighted OLS with year fixed effects and clustered standard errors, prints the summary, and saves a coefficient table to /app/data/replication_country_year_median_age_regression.csv

codebase.notes: .do file from original authors was translated to Python as required. All I/O is directed to /app/data.

analysis.instructions: Inside the docker container run:  python /app/data/original/18/0203_o3/replication_data/replication_analysis.py
analysis.comparison_metrics: Compare sign, magnitude (pp per 1-SD change) and p-value of the median_age coefficient with the original study’s reported −2.5 pp effect (initial_details.txt).
